definitions: Hits someone or something with a hand, weapon, or other implement.
Attacks or inflicts damage on someone or something.
Occurs to someone suddenly or unexpectedly.
Refuses to work as a form of organized protest.
Ignites a match by rubbing it against a rough surface.
examples: He strikes the ball with great force.
The workers' union strikes for better pay.
She strikes a match to light the candle.
